sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Justice40 Oversight Committee Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Justice40 Oversight Committee Act.

sections.heading: Definition. In this Act, "Oversight Committee" means the Justice40 Oversight Committee established under Section 15.
sections.text: Definition. In this Act, "Oversight Committee" means the Justice40 Oversight Committee established under Section 15.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
